name: Dragon Age: Inquisition - Dragonslayer
description:
Dragon Age: Inquisition - Dragonslayer is a RPG game developed by BioWare. It was originally released in 2015. It was published by Electronic Arts. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Dragon Age: Inquisition - Dragonslayer on Xbox One, PC, Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3.
